options.systemMessage:
You are a professional LinkedIn content creator AI. Your task is to analyze up to 3 provided articles and generate one concise, professional, and engaging LinkedIn post specifically targeting B2B audiences such as lawyers, real estate professionals, SaaS founders, healthcare providers, coaches, and consultants.

Guidelines:

Tone & Style: Inspiring, authoritative, professional, and easy to read. Write in a way that resonates with B2B decision-makers.

Content:

Summarize the key insights or lessons from the articles.

Connect them in a cohesive way to create a single narrative.

Focus on actionable value, thought leadership, or business growth insights relevant to B2B professionals.

Formatting:

Keep the post under 250 words.

Use line breaks for readability.

Include relevant emojis naturally to emphasize points.

Add relevant hashtags at the end (5–8 max) for engagement.

Do Not: Copy entire sentences from the articles verbatim; rephrase and synthesize.

Output Structure:

Hook/Opening: Attention-grabbing statement or question tailored to B2B professionals.

Core Insight: Summarized lesson from the articles relevant to B2B growth, efficiency, or strategy.

Actionable Takeaway: Practical advice or reflection for business improvement.

Closing: Inspirational ending with a subtle call to engage (comment/share).

Hashtags & emojis: End with relevant, industry-specific hashtags.

Instruction: Always create a post that feels authentic, professional, and inspiring while reflecting the combined insights of the provided articles, with a focus on delivering real value to B2B business audiences.

json.answer: AI video generators create videos from text, images, or other inputs. They often offer free trials and commercial use options. Popular tools include DeeVid AI and Invideo AI.

AI Video Generator:

Create Amazing Videos with AI
==================================================

Turn your text, images, or video prompts into high-quality videos in simple prompts.

We Explore Every Possibility of AI Video Creation
-------------------------------------------------

Text to Video AI
----------------

Transform written content into captivating videos with ease. Simply input your text prompt, and let the AI generate a fully-realized video that brings your words to life.

Prompt
A dreamlike beachside photoshoot at dawn, with the model silhouetted against crashing waves. Her flowing scarf dances in the wind, while the soft pink and purple hues of the sky reflect on the wet sand. The camera slowly circles her for a cinematic feel.

Image to Video AI
-----------------

Turn still images into animated video clips. Whether you're using a single image or a series of images, our AI can animate them, adding movement, transitions, and effects to create engaging video content.

[Try DeeVid AI](https://deevid.ai/image-to-video)

Video to Video AI
-----------------

Easily transform your existing videos into entirely new styles and formats. Add special effects, change the overall mood, or convert a video into a different genre, AI Video Generator makes it simple.

[Try DeeVid AI](https://deevid.ai/video-to-video)

### Popular Video Templates

A range of fun and attractive video templates wait for you to explore. From heartwarming moments like AI-generated kisses or hugs to festive greetings like AI Santa videos, you can easily create memorable content for your audience.

[Try DeeVid AI](https://deevid.ai/template)

Super LLM Makes the Best AI AI Video Generator
----------------------------------------------

### Fast Video Generation

Experience the speed of AI-powered video creation. Generate videos in one minute, saving you time and effort compared to traditional video editing methods.

### High-Quality Video Output

We employ advanced algorithms to ensure smooth animations, transitions, and effects.Consistent, make high-quality videos that stand out on any platform.

### Easy to Operate

You don't need to be a video editor to create stunning videos! The user-friendly interface is designed for ease of use, allowing anyone—from beginners to professionals—to generate videos with minimal effort.

[Try DeeVid AI](https://deevid.ai/image-to-video)

Your Safety, Our Priority
-------------------------

*   **Data Privacy:** Your images and videos are securely processed. We do not share your data with any third parties, ensuring your intellectual property is protected.
*   **Safe Content Creation:** We detect and prevent the creation of harmful or inappropriate content. You can trust that all videos generated are safe for all ages.

FAQ
---

What types of input can I use to create videos?

You can provide text, images, or video prompts. The AI will generate a video based on the input provided.

Can I customize the video output?

Yes, you can personalize your video with different styles, effects, and formats to suit your needs.

Is there a free trial of AI Video Generator?

Yes, we offer a free trial so you can test the AI Video Generator before committing to a plan.

How long does it take to generate an AI video?

Typically, it takes just one minute to generate a video, depending on the complexity of your input.

How secure is my data here?

We take privacy seriously and ensure that all data is encrypted and handled according to strict privacy policies.

How do I start with the AI Video Generator?

Getting started with the AI Video Generator is easy and straightforward. Simply sign up for a free trial or log in if you already have an account. Once you're logged in, you'll be prompted to input your text, image, or video prompt. After that, the AI will quickly process your request and generate a high-quality video. Customize it further with styles and effects, then download or share your video directly.

Can I use AI-generated videos for commercial purposes?

Yes, you can use AI-generated videos for commercial purposes. Whether you're creating videos for advertising, social media marketing, or promotional content, our platform provides you with the necessary rights to use your generated videos commercially. However, please review our terms of service for any specific usage guidelines or restrictions related to intellectual property and copyright to ensure compliance with local regulations.

![Image 9: Bring Your Ideas to Life Today](https://deevid.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fhome%2Fcta-mask.png&w=3840&q=75)

Unlock Limitless Creativity!

![Image 23: prev-button](https://web-assets.invideo.io/landing-pages/prod/homepage/previous-arrow.svg)![Image 24: next-button](https://web-assets.invideo.io/landing-pages/prod/homepage/next-arrow.svg)

Want to know more?
------------------

How does Invideo AI generate videos automatically?

![Image 25: collapse](https://web-assets.invideo.io/common/prod/icons/rounded-close.svg)

Invideo AI uses powerful AI models to generate scripts from your prompts. It then sifts through 16m+ stock images and videos and selects relevant content for your video. Additionally, it also produces voiceover for the script that was submitted while adding background music and other elements like transitions that it deems fit for your prompt.

Which is the best AI video generator?

![Image 26: collapse](https://web-assets.invideo.io/common/prod/icons/rounded-close.svg)

Invideo AI is one of the best AI video generators. You can use it to create AI videos by just entering text prompts.

What kind of voices does your AI video generator tool provide? 

![Image 27: collapse](https://web-assets.invideo.io/common/prod/icons/rounded-close.svg)

You can choose from male or female human voices using our AI video generator, you can even select a language and an accent.

Is Invideo AI beginner-friendly? 

![Image 28: collapse](https://web-assets.invideo.io/common/prod/icons/rounded-close.svg)

Absolutely! Anyone from a beginner to an expert can create videos on Invideo AI.You can create explainer videos, marketing videos, promo videos & many more using the free online AI video generator by Invideo AI.

Do I need to download any software to use the AI video generator by Invideo AI?

![Image 29: collapse](https://web-assets.invideo.io/common/prod/icons/rounded-close.svg)

No downloads are needed to generate videos using Invideo AI. It is a web-based tool, and it works well on all popular browsers such as Safari, Google Chrome, and others on all devices from mobile to desktops. 

Which free AI video generator tool works best for creating marketing clips?

![Image 30: collapse](https://web-assets.invideo.io/common/prod/icons/rounded-close.svg)

Invideo AI is the best AI video generator, free to use and widely trusted by digital marketers worldwide for creating engaging marketing videos. This video creator offers users advanced features such as AI-generated visuals, human-like AI voiceovers, AI-powered scripts, and more to produce stunning clips that drive user engagement. 

Turn a prompt into a video with Invideo AI
------------------------------------------

results.title: Never Made An AI Video Before? Start Here! - YouTube
results.content:
The REALITY of AI Video in 2025 (it’s not what you think)
Jeff Su
1460000 subscribers
763 likes
18242 views
7 Oct 2025
📈 Grab my AI Toolkit - https://academy.jeffsu.org/ai-toolkit?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=190

Forget the hype about #AI replacing Hollywood overnight. The reality is that although AI video tools are incredibly powerful, there's no magic button that creates entire videos with one prompt. The real challenge is consistency: getting your characters, voices, and scenes to stay the same across multiple clips.

In this video, I walk through the exact 4-step workflow I use to create multi-scene AI videos with consistent characters. We'll use Google Whisk, Flow, a custom Gemini Gem, and ElevenLabs to build a complete skit from scratch.

No BS, just the actual process.

*TIMESTAMPS*
00:00 The Reality of the AI Video Landscape
00:25 Bottom Line Up Front
04:15 Step 1
06:34 Step 2
08:53 Step 3
12:43 Step 4
14:56 Final Thoughts
16:09 Sora 2 Rollout and Implications

*RESOURCES MENTIONED*
Prompts & Templates: https://www.jeffsu.org/the-reality-of-ai-video-a-no-bullshit-guide/
Other free resources: https://www.jeffsu.org/links/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=190

*BUILD A POWERFUL WORKFLOW*
📈 The Workspace Academy - https://academy.jeffsu.org/workspace-academy?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=190
✍️ My Notion Command Center - https://www.pressplay.cc/link/s/DE1C4C50

*BE MY FRIEND:*
📧 Subscribe to my newsletter - https://www.jeffsu.org/newsletter/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=description
📸 Instagram - https://instagram.com/j.sushie
🤝 LinkedIn - https://www.linkedin.com/in/jsu05/

*MY FAVORITE GEAR*
🎬 My YouTube Gear - https://www.jeffsu.org/yt-gear/
🎒 Everyday Carry - https://www.jeffsu.org/my-edc/
